# Visualization for ABM Model version 5

## Environment Setup

```{r}
# --------------------------------------------------------
# clear the environment var area
rm(list = ls())
# clear all plots
graphics.off()
# clear the console area
cat("\014")
```

## Read data with 'Fread' function

```{r}
library(data.table)
model5.results <- fread("./model5results.csv")
```

## Filter data only when p=0.01

```{r}
library(dplyr)
data = model5.results %>% filter(p == 0.01, AgentID == 100, Step == 100)
```

## Draw Box Plot

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data, aes(y = Steps_to_25_percent)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Boxplot",
       x = "Category",
       y = "Value") +
  theme_minimal()
```
